#summary nmrglue's source code is hosted on github.

= nmrglue source code =

nmrglue's source code is hosted on Github.  


= Access =

To view nmrglue's source code visit the project's github page:

http://github.com/jhelmus/nmrglue

To check out a copy of the source code for yourself:

git clone git://github.com/jhelmus/nmrglue.git

To learn more about Git and github, see http://github.com

= Contributing to nmrglue =

If you are interested in contributing to nmrglue please the preferred method is:

1. Go to http://github.com/jhelmus/nmrglue and fork the project.

2. Make changes to your fork of the project.

3. Create a pull request http://help.github.com/send-pull-requests/ on your repository.  

Patches and comments are also accepted through the Issue tracker or by mailing the nmrglue mailing list or Jonathan Helmus directly.
